title: Anatomy Blueprint
description: Defines the structural graph of how body parts connect via sockets

$schema.description: Optional. A URI reference to the schema that this document conforms to

root.description: The root entity definition ID that serves as the entry point for the anatomy graph

attachments.description: Static parent-child relationships in the anatomy graph

defaultSlots.description: Default slot configurations that can be overridden by recipes

attachment.description: Defines a parent-child relationship via a socket

socket.description: The socket ID on the parent where the child attaches

child.description: The child entity definition ID to attach (use with requirements for more flexibility)

requirements.description: Flexible requirements for selecting a child entity

entityId.description: Specific entity definition ID to prefer

components.description: Required components that the child entity must have

partType.description: The part type that the child must be (e.g., 'head', 'arm')

childSlots.description: Slot specifications for sockets on the attached part
